metadata.description: Scheduled Tasks event fields for S1QL 2.0 queries

fields.description: Name of a scheduled task, as generated by the Host
Full path location of a scheduled task

The reason this task was executed. 0 is Unknown. 1 means this is a recurring task executed every X time. 2 means the event this task waits on has happened. 3 means this is a task that was scheduled to be executed immediately after its creation. 5 means this task was triggered because the system was idle. 6 means it was executed on boot. 7 means the tasks is wired to trigger on user logon. 8 means "other" reason, similar to 0.
